blocks.text: Norway's golden hour: speed skating final and Bodo/Glimt's European triumph
Bodo/Glimt's 3-1 demolition of Internazionale is one of Norwegian football's finest European nights. In Milano, Kongshaug, Eitrem, and Strand chase 1500m speed skating gold at 16:30.
